definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
to support one's family (idiom); to have difficulty feeding a family
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
to fool/to deceive/to go through the motions

sentences.english: The results showed that the cathode pastes obtained can be satisfied with the request of user.
sentences.chinese: 经用户对阴极糊的实际使用，效果良好。

sentences.english: Carbon Resources is India's leading manufacturer of Carbon Electrode Paste.
sentences.chinese: 碳资源是印度的碳电极糊的领先制造商。

sentences.english: If you boil the vegetables too long, they'll go soggy.
sentences.chinese: 要是你把蔬菜煮得太久，菜就糊了。

sentences.english: Onions can be boiled and pulped to a puree .
sentences.chinese: 洋葱可以煮一下打成糊。

sentences.english: Papering the ceiling proved next to impossible without a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 用纸糊天花板没有梯子儿乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Add in melted shortening and seaweed to become the cake batter.
sentences.chinese: 加入融化了的白油，海苔，拌匀成蛋糕糊。

sentences.english: More than 390 products containing peanut butter or peanut paste have been recalled.
sentences.chinese: 390多种被污染的花生酱和花生糊产品被召回。

sentences.english: Get your strips of newspaper and paste them up.
The basic properties of the starch paste of the paste of waxy corn grown in China were researched.
sentences.chinese: 主要测定国产蜡质玉米淀粉糊的基本性质。

sentences.english: At last, pour all the remaining milk in the egg mixture. Mix.
sentences.chinese: 最后，将所有剩余的牛奶全部倒入鸡蛋糊，拌匀。

sentences.english: Don't be so wishy-washy. Tell us how you really feel.
sentences.chinese: 别这么含含混糊的，告诉我们你的实在感触吧。

sentences.english: It was stupid of you to turn it upside down without closing the lid.
sentences.chinese: 你没有盖上盖子就把它倒过来，真是糊胡涂。

sentences.english: Whip up the cream and fold in mascarpone cheese with green tea powder.
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶油打发后与马士卡彭乳酪和绿茶粉拌匀成奶油糊。

sentences.english: You know -------- the kind you get from drinking peanut-butter milkshakes.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，就是喝奶油花生糊沾在嘴上的那种小胡子。

sentences.english: These vegetables have been boiling too long; they're cooked to a pulp.
sentences.chinese: 这些蔬菜煮的时间太长了，都煮成糊了。

sentences.english: A paste of vinegar and baking soda will also work will on rusty shower stalls.
sentences.chinese: 甲醋和小苏打糊也将在生锈的淋浴间将。

definition: to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
paste/also written 漿糊|浆糊[jiang4 hu5]/Taiwan pr. [jiang4 hu2]
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
